sentences.en: ‘How was I to know!’ Jenny raged.
As the evening progressed, sadness turned to rage.
sentences.cn: 随着夜幕逐渐降临，悲伤变成了愤怒。

sentences.en: He was filled with an ungovernable rage.
I saw her in a towering rage only once.
sentences.cn: 我只有一次见过她大发雷霆。

sentences.en: I was distraught and let out a bellow of tearful rage.
sentences.cn: 我心烦意乱，流着眼泪发了一通火。

sentences.en: In the union office, the mood gradually changed from resignation to rage.
sentences.cn: 在工会办公室，情绪慢慢从顺从转变成愤怒。

sentences.en: It's enough to make them choke with apoplectic rage.
sentences.cn: 足以气得让他们说不出话来。

sentences.en: Lesley yelled at him with blind, hating rage.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉心生愤恨，盛怒之下对他大嚷大叫。

sentences.en: Losing a game would cause him to fly into a rage.
sentences.cn: 输掉一场比赛会让他暴跳如雷。

sentences.en: Molly leapt to her feet, spluttering and howling with rage.
sentences.cn: 莫利跳了起来，气急败坏地大吼起来。

sentences.en: Most air rage incidents involve heavy drinking.
sentences.cn: 大多数的空中暴力事件与酗酒有关。

sentences.en: Richens was 17 when he flew into a rage and stabbed another teenager.
sentences.cn: 里琴斯17岁那年一怒之下捅了一名少年。

sentences.en: She grinned derisively while I seethed with rage.
sentences.cn: 我怒火中烧，她却嘲弄地咧着嘴笑。

sentences.en: Sobbing with rage, Carol was taken to the hospital.
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔气得呜呜哭，被送往医院。

sentences.en: The 1950s look is all the rage at the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前，20世纪50年代的装扮正流行。

sentences.en: The rage in his eyes made her blood run cold.
sentences.cn: 他眼中的怒火吓得她汗毛倒竖。

sentences.en: William was seized with uncontrollable rage.

phrases.tran_cn: 暴怒行为（主要是指驾驶人因不耐前车或不满抢道而引起的愤怒）

trans.tran_cn: 愤怒，激烈，猛烈，渴望，疯狂，〈口〉战争狂
trans.tran_en: Rage is strong anger that is difficult to control
a strong feeling of uncontrollable anger
to feel very angry about something and show this in the way you behave or speak
